alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Cass; North Itasca; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 3:02PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Itasca and northeastern Cass Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 302 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Coleraine, to near Boy River, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Deer River and Zemple around 320 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle until the storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Cass; North Itasca; South Itasca
